attributes.action: compell the British Olympic Association to boycott the opening and closing ceremonies of this year's Beijing Olympic games
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By conducting a protest identical to that at Moscow in 1980, we will show that we disapprove of Beijing's appalling human rights record whilst not preventing our athletes from competing or severing diplomatic and economic relations with China.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
